climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Fashionable Decoration: Chic boho palette accented with elegant embroidered tufts comforter sets create exquisite geometric patterns and look more than stunning that elevate your space with farmhouse and modern elements. It provides timeless elegance and fashion to your bedroom decor.

Soft and Breathable: The king tufted comforter sets have premium microfiber fabric which is breathable and sweat-absorbent. And also the comforter is filled with extremely soft down alternative microfiber which is friendly to those sneezing with goose down and feather bedding; Experience a fabulous night's rest with our sets

Easy Care: The bedding sets are machine washable which can save you more time and energy. For year round softness and prevent pilling up, it's highly recommend to wash it in the gentle cycle with cold water, sun-dry or tumble dry in low when needed. Let our comforter sheets keep providing you and your family with cozy sleeping

What You Can Get: King size comforter set includes 1 Comforter 102"x90", 2 Pillow Shams 20"x26. Our comforter sets is packaged in a vacuum bag, so you can dry it in low heat or tap the comforter gently while baking it in the sun to fluffy again

Satisfactory Service: As your satisfaction is of the utmost importance to us. CozyLux is committed to offering you premium products and a caring service. Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions about our products. We would try our best to solve problems as soon as possible

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty nice comforter, especially for the cost. I thought it was going to be thin or clumpy but it was surprisingly well stuffed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for something beautiful and functional and this is definitely both. And the king size fit in my washer and dryer. I would highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks and feels expensive without the cost
reviews.reviewText: Soft, light, not too bulky to be able to throw in the washer, keep you warm in the cold weather.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for Price, but not High Quality
reviews.reviewText: The color of this set is very pretty and I like the design overall. It is quite thin so I would categorize this as a summer comforter. According to the listing photos the backside was supposed to be cotton while the outer layer was supposed to be polyester. However, the comforter I received said it was 100% polyester, which is not particularly breathable. It has a very relaxed look about it and even after drying to fluff it up it still looked wrinkled. If you prefer a crisp look or are looking for something breathable I would pass on this set. However, if you are looking for a reasonable priced set in a pretty color this may work for you. I am using it in my guest bedroom so it can be layered with other blankets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I dried the comforter in the dryer with tennis balls and it came out nice and fluffy! The design gave me the boho look I was looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Order a larger size
reviews.reviewText: They comforter is a lot smaller than shown. I ordered a king size and we have a king size bed, and it really doesn’t even go down on the sides past the mattress or anything too small

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really pretty, great folor, very good quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm and comfy - an exceptional value
reviews.reviewText: This is by far the best comforter we have used.The microfiber material is silky soft, with just the right amount of polyester fiber fill to provide warmth and comfort without too much weight or bulk.The fiberfill in this comforter has several advantages over down or loose fills, first it is hyperallergic, so no worries about allergies or asthma, second, it does not bunch up or lose its shape like down or loose fills, even when hanging over the sides of the bed. We found this to be a huge advantage, which provides better insulation and comfort, without the need to redistribute the down every morning.The 100% polyester microfiber cloth feels wonderful. The sensation is somewhere between silk and flannel, smoother than flannel, but not cold like silk, it is very soft, warm and cozy.The comforter has a tufted herringbone pattern on top with a smooth fabric on the bottom. We found the weight to be perfect for cool winter nights. We set our heat low at night and were able to eliminate two blankets by replacing our old comforter with this one.To be honest, based on the price, we did not expect this set to be as good as it is, especially when compared to what our down comforter cost. We have nothing but praise for this set. It is an exceptional value.
